caption: A woman in a pink dress was brushing her teeth in the bathroom. Another woman in white clothes got out of bed and also started brushing her teeth. In a small alley, there were many people. One woman was reading a magazine in her car, another woman was standing by the roadside as a bus approached, and yet another woman was riding a bicycle. Finally, four women came together in what seemed like a betrayal. On a stage, two boys were performing. On a forest path, two boys were riding a bicycle. Later, the two of them rode two bicycles, each with two girls. The scene returned to the place where the four women and two men met. They were walking along the street, interacting from time to time.
